languages.text: {n}Назракей отмахивается от Маражая, как от надоедливой мухи.{/n} "Совет архонтов услышал достаточно пустых слов, дракон Маражай, и более не желает..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Назракей отмахивается от Маражая, как от надоедливой мухи.{/n} "Совет архонтов услышал достаточно пустых слов, Дракон Маражай, и более не желает..."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei dismisses Marazhai like a bothersome fly.{/n} "The Council of Archons has heard enough platitudes, Dracon Marazhai, and no longer wishes to—"

languages.text: {n}纳札骸朝玛拉斋挥挥手，仿佛在赶走讨厌的苍蝇一样。{/n}“执政官议会已经听腻了这些陈词滥调。玛拉斋裁决官，我们已经不再打算——”
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei dismisses Marazhai like a bothersome fly.{/n} "The Council of Archons has heard enough platitudes, Dracon Marazhai, and no longer wishes to—"

traits.locale_text: {n}纳札骸朝玛拉斋挥挥手，仿佛在赶走讨厌的苍蝇一样。{/n}“执政官议会已经听腻了这些陈词滥调。玛拉斋裁决官，我们已经不再打算——”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: {n}ナズラクヘイはうっとうしいハエのようにマラズハイを退けた。{/n}「ドラコン・マラズハイ、アーコン評議会はこれ以上つまらぬ言い訳を聞くつもりは…」
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei dismisses Marazhai like a bothersome fly.{/n} "The Council of Archons has heard enough platitudes, Dracon Marazhai, and no longer wishes to—"

traits.locale_text: {n}ナズラクヘイはうっとうしいハエのようにマラズハイを退けた。{/n}「ドラコン・マラズハイ、アーコン評議会はこれ以上つまらぬ言い訳を聞くつもりは…」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei ignora a Marazhai como si se tratara de un molesto insecto.{/n} «El Consejo de Arcontes ya ha oído suficientes quejas, dracón Marazhai, y ya no desea...».
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei dismisses Marazhai like a bothersome fly.{/n} "The Council of Archons has heard enough platitudes, Dracon Marazhai, and no longer wishes to—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei ignora a Marazhai como si se tratara de un molesto insecto.{/n} «El Consejo de Arcontes ya ha oído suficientes quejas, dracón Marazhai, y ya no desea...».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei fait un geste pour interrompre Marazhai comme s'il chassait une mouche.{/n} « Le Conseil des archontes en a assez de vos platitudes, dracon Marazhai, et ne souhaite plus... »
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei dismisses Marazhai like a bothersome fly.{/n} "The Council of Archons has heard enough platitudes, Dracon Marazhai, and no longer wishes to—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei fait un geste pour interrompre Marazhai comme s'il chassait une mouche.{/n} « Le Conseil des archontes en a assez de vos platitudes, dracon Marazhai, et ne souhaite plus... »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei winkt ab, als wäre Marazhai eine störende Fliege.{/n} "Der Rat der Archonten hat schon genug Plattitüden gehört, Dracon Marazhai, und möchte nicht länger ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei dismisses Marazhai like a bothersome fly.{/n} "The Council of Archons has heard enough platitudes, Dracon Marazhai, and no longer wishes to—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei winkt ab, als wäre Marazhai eine störende Fliege.{/n} "Der Rat der Archonten hat schon genug Plattitüden gehört, Dracon Marazhai, und möchte nicht länger ..."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei, Marazhai'ı kendisini rahatsız eden bir sinekmiş gibi susturuyor.{/n} "Arkonlar Konseyi yeterince basmakalıp söz duydu Drakon Marazhai. Artık daha fazla..."
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei dismisses Marazhai like a bothersome fly.{/n} "The Council of Archons has heard enough platitudes, Dracon Marazhai, and no longer wishes to—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei, Marazhai'ı onu rahatsız eden bir sinekmiş gibi susturuyor.{/n} "Arkonlar Konseyi yeterince basmakalıp söz duydu Drakon Marazhai ve artık daha fazla..."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect
